item.title: Protected Groups in Active Directory
item.dc:creator: Jordan Benzing
item.description: The Question: This morning we hired a new and wonderful guy for our Help-desk and when setting up this persons account a strange oddity occured that caused one of the other helpdesk workers to come over to me and ask, “Hey why can’t I reset this new guys account? I can reset anyone else’s account but not his”. Now, I’m not proud I’ll admit at first I was stumped on this one there shouldn’t be any reason why you can’t reset his account I said – Mildly grumpy having only had one cup of coffee so far that day – Show me what you mean!
